SEARCH
Package com.gaminghub.app.data.entity

Class GameEntity

java.lang.Object
com.gaminghub.app.data.entity.GameEntity
@Table("games") public class GameEntity extends Object
Represents the persistent entity for a game, mapped to the games table in the database.

This entity is used in the data layer for database operations and maps directly to the structure of the `games` table. It includes fields such as title, genre, platform, price, and creation timestamp.

This class can be converted to a GameModel for use in the presentation layer.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameEntity

      public GameEntity(int game_id, String title, String genre, String platform, float price, String description, float rating, String img, Timestamp created_at)
      Constructs a GameEntity with the given game details.
      Parameters:
      game_id - unique game ID
      title - title of the game
      genre - genre of the game
      platform - platform the game is available on
      price - price of the game
      description - short description of the game
      rating - average user rating of the game
      img - image path or URL for the game
      created_at - timestamp when the game was created
